profiles.label: Inherit mode
profiles.description: Use the selected topology preset exactly as configured.

profiles.label: Force wrap all
profiles.description: Wrap all non-gravity axes regardless of selected preset mode.

profiles.label: Force invert all
profiles.description: Invert all non-gravity axes regardless of selected preset mode.

profiles.label: Twist X both edges
profiles.description: Crossing either X edge adds inversion coupling for wrapped companion axes.

profiles.label: Twist +X only
profiles.description: Only crossing the positive X edge adds inversion coupling.

profiles.label: Twist +Z only
profiles.description: Only crossing the positive Z edge adds inversion coupling (3D/4D).

profiles.label: Twist +W only
profiles.description: Only crossing the positive W edge adds inversion coupling (4D).
